tool_description: Connaître et localiser les partenaires Mobilis de l'OPT-NC
name: Partenaires Mobilis
title: Partenaires Mobilis

api_list.name: Partenaire par id
api_list.description: Récupérer un partenaire par son id

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: id du partenaire fourni par API.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://partenaires-mobilis.p.rapidapi.com/api/partenaires/14"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "partenaires-mobilis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://partenaires-mobilis.p.rapidapi.com/api/partenaires/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "partenaires-mobilis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
